rss.channel: Diving into Economic Perspectives en-us Sebastian Kranz AI generated audio deep dives into selected articles from the Journal of Economic Perspectives. Generated using Google's NotebookLM. This podcast is a private project from Sebastian Kranz (Ulm University) and not endorsed in any way by the Journal of Economic Perspectives, the American Economic Association or the authors of the underlying articles. Personally, I really like these audio deep dives. But don't forget that AI can still hallucinate and make other mistakes. Sebastian Kranz https://raw.githubusercontent.com/skranz/jep_podcast/main/logo_podcast_square.png Diving into Economic Perspectives no episodic economics, research, journal of economic perspectives, AI narration, deep dive, notebooklm {{episodes}}
